thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 07 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: First Cobalt Says Institutional Shareholder Services, Glass Lewis Recommend That US Cobalt Shareholders Vote For Acquisition

author: Reuters Editorial
title: First Cobalt Says Institutional Shareholder Services, Glass Lewis Recommend That US Cobalt Shareholders Vote For Acquisition

organizations.name: first cobalt says institutional shareholder services
glass lewis recommend that us cobalt shareholders vote for acquisition

text:
May 7 (Reuters) - First Cobalt Corp:
* LEADING INDEPENDENT PROXY ADVISORY FIRMS ISS AND GLASS LEWIS RECOMMEND US COBALT SHAREHOLDERS VOTE “FOR” PROPOSED ACQUISITION BY FIRST COBALT
* FIRST COBALT CORP - INSTITUTIONAL SHAREHOLDER SERVICES AND GLASS LEWIS RECOMMEND THAT US COBALT SHAREHOLDERS VOTE “FOR” ACQUISITION BY FIRST COBALT Source text for Eikon:
Our
